EnablingAuthority.XRefExternal: FIRST NATIONS JURISDICTION OVER EDUCATION IN BRITISH COLUMBIA ACT

Identification.LongTitle: Order Bringing Individual Agreements with First Nations into Effect

Provision.Text: Whereas an individual agreement has been entered into with each of the bands referred to in the annexed Order;

Therefore, Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Crown-Indigenous Relations makes the annexed Order Bringing Individual Agreements with First Nations into Effect under subsection 5(1) of the First Nations Jurisdiction over Education in British Columbia Acta.

Section.Text: For the purposes of the First Nations Jurisdiction over Education in British Columbia Act, the following individual agreements are in effect:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: the Canada-First Nation Education Jurisdiction Agreement between Canada and ?aq’am Community, entered into on May 26, 2022;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: the Canada-First Nation Education Jurisdiction Agreement between Canada and Cowichan Tribes, entered into on May 26, 2022;

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: the Canada-First Nation Education Jurisdiction Agreement between Canada and Lil’wat Nation, entered into on May 25, 2022; and

Paragraph.Label: (d)
Paragraph.Text: the Canada-First Nation Education Jurisdiction Agreement between Canada and Seabird Island Band, entered into on May 25, 2022.

Heading.TitleText: Related Amendment to the First Nations Jurisdiction over Education in British Columbia Act

Section.Text: This Order comes into force on July 1, 2022, but if it is registered after that day, it comes into force on the day on which it is registered.
